item.title: Update Warrant free tier
item.description: https://warrant.dev/ - Hosted enterprise-grade authorization and access control service for your apps. Free tier includes 1 million API requests per month and 1,000 authz rules.

item.title: Added Sema
item.description:
https://www.semasoftware.com/ - Free developer portfolio tool able to consolidate and snapshot contributions across multiple repositories into a single report.
https://www.semasoftware.com/ - Free code review tool. Code reviewers have access to a library of best practices to quickly relay targeted feedback. Dashboards on the website showcase trends.

item.title: Add css-gradient.com
item.description: https://www.css-gradient.com/ - Free tool to easily generate custom cross browser css gradients. In RGB and HEX format.

item.title: add splitbee
item.description: https://splitbee.io/ - Track and optimize your online business with Splitbee. Free plan includes up to 2,500 events / month, 6 months retention, 1 x Active A/B Test and 1 x Active Automation.
